title: The Boy Next Door
description: When Lowell moves back to his hometown to take care of his ailing mother, the last person he expects to see living in the house next door is his childhood friend Jase, grown up now and more attractive than ever. Jase had starred in many of Lowellâ€™s teenage fantasies, but Lowell is convinced Jase is straight. And yet, as they rekindle their friendship, it begins to look like Jase might not be so straight after all.Jase has problems of his his troubled ex-wife has allowed him full custody of their daughter on one he never exposes her to his affairs with other men. The arrangement works just fine until he starts falling for Lowell and a whole new world of possibilities opens up for him. But how can he have a relationship with a man and still keep his daughter?Publisher's This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find Male/male sexual practices.
author: Kate McMurray
